spec:
---
paths:
  /restaurants:
    get:
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Restaurant'
              examples:
                restaurants_json:
                  value:
                    - restaurantId: A string
                      foodType: A string
                      foodStatus: A string
                      preparationTime: value
                      address: value
          description: Get list of restaurants
      tags:
        - restaurants
      operationId: GetRestaurant
      summary: Get list of restaurants
    post:
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Restaurant'
            examples:
              '1':
                value:
                  restaurantId: A string
                  foodType: A string
                  foodStatus: A string
                  preparationTime: value
                  address: value
        required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Restaurant'
              examples:
                '1':
                  value:
                    restaurantId: A string
                    foodType: A string
                    foodStatus: A string
                    preparationTime: value
                    address: value
          description: Changed Restaurant
      operationId: Post Restaurant
      summary: Post Restaurant
    summary: Global operations on restaurants
  '/restaurants/{id}':
    get:
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Restaurant'
              examples:
                '1':
                  value:
                    restaurantId: A string
                    foodType: A string
                    foodStatus: A string
                    preparationTime: value
                    address: value
          description: restaurants with specified id
      parameters:
        - examples:
            A string:
              value: A string
          name: id
          description: Restaurant name
          schema:
            type: string
          in: path
          required: true
      operationId: GetRestaurantById
      summary: Get Restaurant by id
      description: Get Restaurant by id
    patch:
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Restaurant'
            examples:
              '1':
                value:
                  restaurantId: A string
                  foodType: A string
                  foodStatus: A string
                  preparationTime: value
                  address: value
        required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Restaurant'
              examples:
                '1':
                  value:
                    restaurantId: A string
                    foodType: A string
                    foodStatus: A string
                    preparationTime: value
                    address: value
          description: Changed Restaurant
      parameters:
        - examples:
            '1':
              value: 1
          name: restaurantId
          description: Restaurant name
          schema:
            type: string
          in: path
          required: true
      operationId: PatchRestaurant
      summary: Patch existing Restaurant
    summary: Specific operation on restaurants
    parameters:
      - name: id
        description: Restaurant id
        schema:
          type: string
        in: path
        required: true
  '/restaurants/{id}/':
    summary: ProvideFood operation on restaurants
    post:
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                restaurantId:
                  description: restaurantId of this ProvideFood
                  type: string
                foodType:
                  description: foodType of this ProvideFood
                  type: string
            examples: null
      parameters:
        - name: id
          description: ProvideFood name
          schema:
            type: string
          in: path
          required: true
          examples: null
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Restaurant'
              examples:
                '1':
                  value:
                    restaurantId: A string
                    foodType: A string
                    foodStatus: A string
                    preparationTime: value
                    address: value
          description: ProvideFood Operation
      operationId: ProvideFood
      summary: ProvideFood
      description: ProvideFood
openapi: 3.1.0
components:
  schemas:
    Restaurant:
      title: Root Type for Restaurant
      description: The root of the Restaurant type's schema.
      type: object
      properties:
        restaurantId:
          description: restaurantId of this Restaurant
          type: string
        foodType:
          description: foodType of this Restaurant
          type: string
        foodStatus:
          description: foodStatus of this Restaurant
          type: string
        preparationTime:
          description: preparationTime of this Restaurant
          type: string
        address:
          description: address of this Restaurant
          type: string
      example:
        restaurantId: A string
        foodType: A string
        foodStatus: A string
        preparationTime: value
        address: value
tags:
  - name: Restaurant
    description: Restaurant resource
info:
  title: Restaurant
  version: 0.0.1
  description: API definition of restaurant
  contact:
    name: creator's name
    url: 'http://creator.homepage.address'
    email: creator@creator.com
  license:
    name: MIT License
    url: 'https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT'
---
paths:
  '/restaurants/{id}/':
    summary: ConfirmOrder operation on restaurants
    post:
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                restaurantId:
                  description: restaurantId of this ConfirmOrder
                  type: string
                foodType:
                  description: foodType of this ProvideFood
                  type: string
                orderId:
                  description: orderId of this ConfirmOrder
                  type: string
            examples: null
      parameters:
        - name: id
          description: ConfirmOrder name
          schema:
            type: string
          in: path
          required: true
          examples: null
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Restaurant'
              examples:
                '1':
                  value:
                    restaurantId: A string
                    foodType: A string
                    foodStatus: A string
                    preparationTime: value
                    address: value
          description: ConfirmOrder Operation
      operationId: ConfirmOrder
      summary: ConfirmOrder
      description: ConfirmOrder
tags:
  - name: Restaurant
    description: Restaurant resource
